# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 감지할 때 검색하는 것을 보여 주며,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-108">키워드 및 체크 수표와 같은 증분 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-113">중요한 정보 유형이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="1301d-114">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-114">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="1301d-115">민감도 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-115">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="1301d-116">보존 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="1301d-117">커뮤니케이션 규정 준수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="1301d-118">자동 레이블 지정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-119">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-120">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-121">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-123">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-124">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-126">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-128">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-129">무형: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-130">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-133">정책은 300자 이내의 근접성에 있는 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색된다고 중간 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-134">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-135">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-137">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-144">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-144">abaroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-149">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-149">routing #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-151">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-153">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-153">routing#</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-155">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-157">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-159">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-160">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-161">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-162">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-163">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-164">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-165">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-166">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-168">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-169">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-170">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-175">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-175">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-176">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-177">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-177">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-178">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-178">documento número</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-182">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-184">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-186">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-187">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-189">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-190">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-195">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-199">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-200">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

 </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-217">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-222">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-223">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-224">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-226">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-227">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-228">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-229">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-230">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-231">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-232">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-233">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-238">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-239">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-240">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-241">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-252">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-253">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-254">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-255">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-256">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-257">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-258">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-259">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-261">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-263">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-265">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-266">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-267">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-270">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-271">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-272">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-274">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-284">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-285">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-286">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-288">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-289">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-290">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-291">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-292">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-293">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-294">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-295">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-296">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-297">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-300">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-301">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-302">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-303">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-304">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-304">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-403">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-405">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-407">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-408">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-408">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-409">9자리 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-409">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-410">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-410">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-411">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-411">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-412">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-413">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-415">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-416">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-417">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-418">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-423">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-423">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-424">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-424">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-430">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-431">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-432">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-434">문자(대소문자 구분 안 하여 7자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-435">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-436">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-438">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-439">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-440">검색된 Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-474">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-475">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-476">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-478">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-479">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-480">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-481">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-482">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-483">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-484">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-488">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-489">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-490">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-502">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-503">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-504">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-506">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-507">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-510">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-511">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-512">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-639">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-640">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-641">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-642">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-643">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-644">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-645">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-646">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-647">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-649">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="1301d-650">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-651">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-653">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-656">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-657">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-660">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-663">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-664">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-665">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-667">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-668">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-669">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-670">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-671">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-672">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-674">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-675">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-676">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-677">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-678">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-679">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-680">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-704">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-704">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-705">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-706">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-706">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-708">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-708">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-709">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-709">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-710">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-710">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-711">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-711">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-712">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-713">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-713">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-714">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-715">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-715">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-716">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-717">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-717">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-719">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-719">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-745">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-745">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-746">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-747">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-747">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-749">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-749">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-750">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-750">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-751">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-751">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-752">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-753">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-753">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-754">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-754">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-755">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-756">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-758">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-758">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-759">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-760">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-760">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-761">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-761">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-762">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-762">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-785">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-785">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-786">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-786">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-787">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-787">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-788">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-788">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-789">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-789">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-790">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-790">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-791">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-791">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-792">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-793">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-793">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-795">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-795">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-796">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-796">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-797">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-797">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-798">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-798">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-799">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-799">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-800">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-800">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-801">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-801">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-802">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-802">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-803">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-803">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-804">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-804">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-805">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-805">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-806">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-807">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-809">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-809">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-810">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-811">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-811">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-812">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-812">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-813">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-813">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-814">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-814">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-815">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-815">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-816">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-816">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-817">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-817">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-818">austrian vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-818">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-819">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-819">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-820">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-820">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-821">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-821">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-822">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-822">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-823">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-823">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-824">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-824">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-825">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-825">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-826">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-826">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-828">vat id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-828">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-829">atu number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-829">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-830">uid number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-830">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-831">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-831">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-832">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-833">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-833">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-834">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-834">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-835">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-835">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-836">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-836">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-837">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-837">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-838">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-838">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-839">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-840">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-841">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-842">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-843">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-843">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-844">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-845">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-845">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-846">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-846">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-847">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-847">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-848">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-848">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-849">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-849">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-850">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-850">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-851">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-851">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-852">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-852">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-853">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-853">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-854">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-854">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-855">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-855">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-856">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-856">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-857">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-857">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-858">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-858">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-859">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-859">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-860">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-860">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-861">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-862">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 및 그 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-862">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-863">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-863">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-864">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-864">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-865">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-865">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-867">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-867">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-868">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-868">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-869">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-869">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-870">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-870">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-871">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-871">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-872">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-872">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-874">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-874">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1301d-875">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-875">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-876">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-876">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-877">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-877">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-878">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-878">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-879">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-879">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-880">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-880">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-881">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-881">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-882">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-882">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-883">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-884">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-886">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-887">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-887">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-888">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-888">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-889">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-889">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-890">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-890">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-891">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-891">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-892">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-892">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-893">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-893">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-894">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-894">northwind</span></span>
