## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1761">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1761">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1762">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1763">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1763">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1765">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1765">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1766">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1766">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1767">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1767">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1768">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1769">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1769">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1770">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1770">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1771">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1771">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1772">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1773">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1773">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1774">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1775">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1775">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1776">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1776">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1777">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1777">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1778">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1778">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1779">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1780">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1781">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1805">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1805">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1806">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1807">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1807">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1809">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1809">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1810">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1811">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1811">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1813">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1814">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1814">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1815">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1815">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1816">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1816">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1952">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1952">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1953">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1953">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1954">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1954">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1956">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1956">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1957">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1958">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1960">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1961">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1961">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1962">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1962">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1965">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1965">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1967">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1967">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1968">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1968">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1969">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1969">automobile accident</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1974">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1974">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1975">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1976">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1976">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1978">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1978">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1980">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1980">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-1981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-1982">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1983">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1983">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-1984">검색된 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-1984">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2014">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2016">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2016">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2018">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2018">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2019">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2022">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2022">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2023">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2023">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2024">검색된 키워드 또는 Keyword_canada_phin 키워드가 Keyword_canada_provinces 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2024">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2025">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2025">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2026">Keyword_canada_phin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2026">Keyword_canada_phin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2027">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2027">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2028">health information act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2028">health information act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2029">income tax information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2029">income tax information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2030">manitoba health</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2030">manitoba health</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2057">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2057">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2058">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2059">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2059">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2061">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2061">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2062">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2062">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2063">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2063">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2064">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2064">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2065">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2065">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2066">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2066">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2067">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2067">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2068">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2069">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2069">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2071">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2072">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2072">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2073">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2073">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2074">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2075">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2076">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2076">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2077">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2077">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2078">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2078">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2079">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2079">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2080">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2080">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2081">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2106">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2106">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2108">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 세분화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2108">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2110">7~8자리 숫자와 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2110">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2111">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2111">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2112">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2112">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2113">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2113">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2114">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2114">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2115">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2115">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2116">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2116">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2117">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2117">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2118">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2119">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2121">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2122">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2122">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2123">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2123">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2124">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2125">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2126">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2127">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2127">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2164">중국 거주 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2164">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2165">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2166">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2166">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2168">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2168">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2169">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2169">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2170">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2170">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2171">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2171">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2172">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2172">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2173">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2174">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2176">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2176">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2177">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2177">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2178">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_china_resident_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2178">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2179">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2179">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2180">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2181">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2182">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2182">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2185">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2185">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2188">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2188">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2189">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2189">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2190">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2190">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2191">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2191">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2193">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2193">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2195">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2195">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2196">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2197">서식이 지정되거나 서식이 없는(dddddd) Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2197">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2199">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 감지하는 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2199">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2201">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2201">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2203">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2204">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2204">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2205">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2205">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2206">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2206">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2207">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2207">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2208">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2208">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2209">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2210">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2210">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2211">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2212">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2472">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2473">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2474">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2474">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2475">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2476">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2476">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2477">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2477">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2478">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2478">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2479">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2479">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2480">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2481">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2481">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2482">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2482">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2606">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2606">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2607">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2607">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2608">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2608">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2609">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2610">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2610">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2612">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2612">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2613">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2614">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2616">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2617">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2617">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2618">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2618">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2649">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2649">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2650">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2651">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2651">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2653">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2653">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2654">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2654">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2655">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2655">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2656">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2656">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2657">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2657">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2658">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2658">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2659">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2659">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2660">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2660">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2661">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2662">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2663">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2681">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2682">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2683">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2685">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2686">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2686">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2687">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2688">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2689">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2691">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2691">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2692">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2693">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2694">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2695">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2696">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2697">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2728">크로아티아 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2728">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2729">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2731">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2731">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2733">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2733">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2734">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2734">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2735">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2735">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2736">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2740">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2740">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2741">키워드가  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2741">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2743">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2743">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2760">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2760">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2761">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2762">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2762">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2763">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2764">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2764">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2765">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2766">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2768">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2768">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2769">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2769">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2770">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2895">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2895">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2896">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2897">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2898">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2899">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2900">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2901">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2902">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2903">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2903">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2905">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2905">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2906">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2907">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2907">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2909">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2910">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2910">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2911">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2911">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2912">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2912">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2914">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2914">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2915">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2915">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2916">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2916">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2917">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2917">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2918">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2918">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2919">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2919">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2920">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2920">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2922">1개 문자와 공백 또는분리자 없는 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2922">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2924">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2924">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2925">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2926">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2926">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2927">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2928">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2928">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2929">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2929">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2930">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2930">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2931">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2931">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2932">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2932">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2933">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2933">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2934">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2934">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2963">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2963">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2964">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2964">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2965">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2965">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2966">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2966">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2967">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2967">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2968">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2968">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2969">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2969">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2970">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2971">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2971">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2972">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2973">8자리 숫자와 한 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2973">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2974">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2974">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2975">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2975">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2976">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2976">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2977">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2978">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2978">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2979">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2980">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2980">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2981">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2981">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2982">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2982">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-2983">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2983">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2984">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2984">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2985">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2985">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-2986">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2986">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2987">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2987">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2988">tax identification code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2988">tax identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2989">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2989">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2990">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2990">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2991">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2991">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-2992">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-2992">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3012">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3012">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3013">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3014">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3014">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3016">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3016">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3017">문자 'E'(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3017">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3018">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3018">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3019">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3019">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3020">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3020">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3021">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3022">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3023">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3024">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3025">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3025">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3026">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3152">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3152">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3153">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3153">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3154">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3154">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3155">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3155">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3156">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3156">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3157">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3158">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3159">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3160">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3161">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3161">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3162">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3163">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3163">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3164">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3165">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3165">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3166">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
