## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3188">체코어 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3188">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3189">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3190">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식) 10자리(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3190">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3191">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3192">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3192">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3193">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3193">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3194">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3194">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3195">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3195">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3196">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3196">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3197">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3197">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3198">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3198">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3199">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3199">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3203">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3204">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3204">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3205">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3205">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3206">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3208">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3208">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3209">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3256">체코 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3256">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3257">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3257">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3258">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3259">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 백래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3259">10 digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3261">10자리 숫자 및 백사시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3261">10 digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3262">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3262">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3263">백 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3263">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3264">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3264">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3265">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3265">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3266">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3267">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3267">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3268">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3269">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3269">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3270">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3270">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3271">키워드가  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3271">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3272">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3273">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3273">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3289">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3289">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3290">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3291">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3291">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3292">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3292">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3293">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3293">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3294">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3295">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3295">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3297">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3297">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3298">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3298">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3299">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3299">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3423">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3423">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3424">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3425">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3425">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3427">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3427">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3428">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3428">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3429">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3429">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3430">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3430">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3431">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3431">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3432">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3432">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3433">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3433">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3434">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3434">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3435">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3435">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3436">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3436">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3437">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3457">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3457">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3458">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3458">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3459">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3459">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3460">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3460">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3461">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3461">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3462">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3462">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3463">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3463">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3464">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3464">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3465">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3466">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3468">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3468">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3469">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3469">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3470">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3470">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3471">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3472">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3472">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3473">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3473">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3474">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3546">덴마크 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3546">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3547">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3547">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3548">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3549">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3549">10 digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3550">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3551">10자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3551">10 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3552">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3552">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3553">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3553">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3554">시퀀스 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3554">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3555">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3556">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3556">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3557">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3558">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3558">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3559">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3559">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3560">키워드가  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3562">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3562">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3576">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3576">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3577">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3578">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3578">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3580">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3580">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3581">이 가능한 문자 집합의 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 하여) 등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3581">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3582">등록자 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 문자인 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3582">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3583">7자리 숫자, 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3583">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3584">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3585">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3585">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3587">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3588">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3588">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3589">키워드가 `Keyword_dea_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3589">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3590">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3590">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3591">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3591">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3592">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3592">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3593">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3593">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3594">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3594">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3595">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3595">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3596">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3596">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3597">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3597">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3598">약 시행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3598">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3599">약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3599">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3600">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3600">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3601">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3602">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3602">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3604">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3604">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3605">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3605">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3606">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3606">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3607">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3608">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3610">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3611">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3611">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3612">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3612">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3738">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3738">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3739">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3739">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3740">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3740">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3741">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3741">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3742">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3742">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3743">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3743">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3744">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3744">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3745">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3746">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3746">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3747">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3748">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3748">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3749">생년월일과 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1~2세대, 1-2세대, 3-4: 20년, 5~6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3749">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3750">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3750">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3751">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3751">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3752">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3752">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3753">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3754">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3754">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3756">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3756">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3757">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3757">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3758">키워드가  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3758">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3759">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3759">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3760">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3760">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3793">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3793">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3794">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3795">1개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3795">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3797">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3797">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3798">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3799">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3799">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3801">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3801">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3802">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3802">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3803">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3803">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3804">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3804">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3805">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3806">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3806">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3807">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3807">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3808">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3808">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3809">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3809">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3810">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3810">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3811">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3811">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3825">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3825">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3826">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3827">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3827">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3828">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3829">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3829">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3830">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3831">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3831">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-3832">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-3833">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3834">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3834">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3835">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3835">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3836">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3836">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3837">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3837">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3838">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3838">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3839">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3839">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3840">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3840">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-3841">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-3841">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4288">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4288">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4289">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4290">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4290">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4292">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4292">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4293">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4293">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4294">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4294">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4295">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4296">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4296">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4297">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4298">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4300">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4301">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4301">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4302">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4302">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4303">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4303">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4433">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4433">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4434">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4435">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4436">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4437">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4438">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4439">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4440">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4441">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4441">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4443">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4443">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4444">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4444">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4445">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4445">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4446">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4446">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4447">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4448">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4450">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4450">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4451">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4451">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4452">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4452">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4453">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4454">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4454">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4455">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4455">ehic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4456">ehic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4456">ehic</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4470">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4470">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4471">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4472">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 더한 세 자리 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4472">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4473">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4474">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4474">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4475">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4475">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4476">century 표식('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4476">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4477">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4477">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4478">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4478">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4479">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4480">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4482">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4482">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4483">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4483">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4484">찾은 Keyword_finnish_national_id 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4484">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4485">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4485">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4487">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4487">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4488">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4488">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4537">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4537">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4538">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4538">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4539">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4539">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4540">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4540">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4541">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4541">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4542">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4542">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4543">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4543">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4544">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4544">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4545">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4546">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4546">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4547">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4548">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4548">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4549">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4549">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4550">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4550">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4551">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4551">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4552">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4552">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4553">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4553">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4554">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4554">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4555">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4556">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4556">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4557">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4557">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4558">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4558">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4559">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4559">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4560">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4560">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4561">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4561">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4562">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4562">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4563">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4563">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4564">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4564">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4578">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4578">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4579">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4579">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4580">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4581">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4581">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4583">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4583">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4584">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4587">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4588">이 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4588">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4589">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4589">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4716">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4716">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4717">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4717">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4718">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4718">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4719">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4719">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4720">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4720">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4721">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4721">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4722">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4722">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4723">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4724">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4724">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4726">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4726">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4727">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4727">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4728">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4728">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4729">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4730">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4730">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4731">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4731">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4732">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4733">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4733">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4734">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4735">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4735">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4736">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4736">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4737">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4737">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4738">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4738">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4739">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4739">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4740">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4740">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4741">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4741">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4742">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4742">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4743">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4743">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4744">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4745">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4745">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4747">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4747">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4748">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4749">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4749">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4751">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4751">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4752">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4752">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4753">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4753">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4758">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4758">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4759">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4759">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4760">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4760">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4762">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4762">national identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4764">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4764">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4765">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4765">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4766">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4766">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4767">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4767">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4768">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4768">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4769">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4769">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4770">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4771">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4771">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4772">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4773">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4773">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4774">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4774">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4775">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4775">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4776">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4776">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4777">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4778">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4778">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4779">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4780">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4781">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4781">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4782">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4782">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4783">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4784">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4785">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4785">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4786">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4786">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4798">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4798">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4799">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4799">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4800">numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4800">numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4801">passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4801">passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4802">passeport non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4802">passeport non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4803">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4803">passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4804">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4804">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4805">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4805">passeportnon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4806">passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4806">passeportn °</span></span>
