## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4817">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4817">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4818">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4819">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4819">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4820">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4821">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4821">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4822">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4822">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4823">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4823">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4824">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4824">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4825">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4826">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4826">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4827">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4828">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4828">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4829">이 `Func_french_insee` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4829">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4830">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4830">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4831">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4831">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4832">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4832">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4833">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4833">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4834">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4834">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4854">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4854">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4855">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4855">d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4865">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4865">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4866">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4867">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4867">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4868">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4869">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4869">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4870">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4870">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4871">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4871">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4872">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4872">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4873">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4873">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4874">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4874">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4875">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4875">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4876">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4876">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4877">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4877">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4878">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4878">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4879">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4879">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4880">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4881">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4881">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4883">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4884">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4884">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4885">키워드가  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4885">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4886">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4886">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4887">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4887">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4891">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4891">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4892">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4892">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4893">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4893">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4894">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4894">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4895">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4895">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4899">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4899">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4900">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4900">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4901">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4901">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4902">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4902">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4903">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4903">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4904">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4904">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4905">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4905">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4906">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4906">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4907">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4907">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4908">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4908">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4909">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4909">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4910">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4910">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4911">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4911">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4912">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4912">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4913">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4913">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4914">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4915">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4915">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4917">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4917">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4918">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4918">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4919">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4919">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4920">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4920">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4921">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4921">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4922">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4922">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4923">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4923">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4924">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4924">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4925">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4925">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4926">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4926">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4927">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4927">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4928">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4928">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4929">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4929">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4930">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4930">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4931">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4931">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4932">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4932">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4933">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4934">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4934">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4947">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4947">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4948">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4948">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4949">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4949">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4950">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4951">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4951">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4952">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4953">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4953">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4954">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4954">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4955">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4955">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4956">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4956">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4957">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4957">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4958">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4958">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4959">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4960">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4960">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-4961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-4962">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4962">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4963">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4963">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4964">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4964">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-4965">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-4965">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5114">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5114">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5115">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5116">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5116">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5117">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5117">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5118">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5119">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5119">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5120">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5120">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5121">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5121">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5122">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5122">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5123">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5123">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5124">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5127">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5127">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5128">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5128">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5129">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5129">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5130">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5130">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5131">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5131">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5132">오스와이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5132">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5133">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5133">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5134">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5134">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5135">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5135">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5136">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5136">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5137">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5137">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5138">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5138">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5139">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5139">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5140">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5140">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5141">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5141">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5142">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5142">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5143">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5143">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5144">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5144">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5145">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5145">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5146">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5146">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5147">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5148">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5148">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5150">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5150">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5151">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5151">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5152">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5152">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5153">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5153">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5154">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5154">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5155">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5156">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5156">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5157">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5158">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5158">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5159">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5159">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5160">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5160">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5161">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5161">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5162">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5163">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5163">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5164">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5164">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5165">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5188">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5188">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5189">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5190">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5190">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5191">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5192">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5192">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5193">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5193">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5194">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5194">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5195">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5195">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5196">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5196">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5197">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5197">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5198">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5198">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5199">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5199">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5200">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5200">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5201">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5205">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5205">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5206">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5206">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5208">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5208">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5234">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5234">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5235">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5236">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5237">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5238">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5239">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5240">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5241">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5242">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5242">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5244">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5244">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5245">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5245">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5246">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5246">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5247">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5247">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5248">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5248">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5249">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5249">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5250">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5250">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5251">선택적 공백 또는 콤마</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5251">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5252">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5252">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5253">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5254">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5254">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5256">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5256">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5257">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5257">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5258">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5258">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5259">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5259">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5260">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5260">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5261">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5261">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5262">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5262">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5263">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5263">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5264">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5264">vat no</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5270">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5270">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5271">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5271">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5272">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5272">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5273">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5273">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5274">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5274">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5275">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5275">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5276">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5277">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5277">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5279">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5279">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5280">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5280">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5281">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5281">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5407">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5407">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5408">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5409">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5409">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5411">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5411">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5412">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5412">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5413">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5413">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5414">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5414">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5415">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5415">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5416">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5416">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5417">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5417">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5418">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5418">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5419">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5420">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5420">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5422">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5423">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5423">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5424">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5424">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5425">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5426">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5426">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5428">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5428">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5429">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5429">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5430">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5430">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5431">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5431">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5432">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5432">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5433">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5433">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5434">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5434">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5435">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5435">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5436">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5436">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5437">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5437">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5438">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5439">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5439">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5440">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5441">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5441">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5442">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5443">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5445">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5445">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5446">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5446">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5447">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5448">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5448">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5449">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5450">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5450">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5451">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5451">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5453">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5453">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5455">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5455">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5456">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5456">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5457">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5457">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5458">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5458">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5459">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5459">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5461">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5461">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5462">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5462">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5463">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5463">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5464">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5464">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5465">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5465">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5466">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5466">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5467">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5467">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5468">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5468">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5469">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5469">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5470">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5470">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5471">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5471">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5472">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5472">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5473">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5473">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5474">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5474">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5475">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5476">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5476">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5478">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5478">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5479">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5479">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5480">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5480">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5481">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5482">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5482">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5484">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5484">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5485">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5485">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5486">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5487">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5488">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5488">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5489">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5490">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5490">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5491">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5491">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5492">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5492">ssn#</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5499">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5499">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5500">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5501">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5502">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5503">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5504">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5505">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5506">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5507">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5507">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5509">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5509">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5510">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5511">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5511">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5513">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5514">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5514">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5515">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5515">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5544">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5544">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5545">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5546">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5546">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5547">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5548">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5548">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5549">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5549">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5550">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5550">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5551">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5551">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5552">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5553">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5553">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5554">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5555">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5556">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5556">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5557">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5557">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5558">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5558">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5559">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5559">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5560">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5560">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5561">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5561">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5600">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5600">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5601">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5601">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5602">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5603">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5603">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5605">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5605">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5606">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5606">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5607">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5607">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5608">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5609">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5610">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5611">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5612">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5612">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5613">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5738">헝가리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5738">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5739">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5739">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5740">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5740">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5741">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5741">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5742">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5742">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5743">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5743">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5744">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5744">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5745">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5746">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5746">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5747">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5748">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5748">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5749">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 여성, 2-여성, 기타 번호는 1900년 이전의 시민 또는 2배 시민권이 있는 시민도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5749">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5750">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5750">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5751">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5751">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5752">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5752">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5753">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5754">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5754">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5756">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5756">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5757">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5757">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5758">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5758">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5759">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5759">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5760">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5760">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5762">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5762">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5766">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5766">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5767">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5767">ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5771">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5771">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5772">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5773">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5773">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5774">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5775">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5775">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5776">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5777">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5778">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5779">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5780">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5780">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5781">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5782">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5782">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5783">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5783">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5784">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5784">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5785">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5785">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5798">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5798">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>
