## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5805">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5805">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5806">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5807">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5807">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5809">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5809">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5810">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5813">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5813">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5814">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5814">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5815">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5815">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5816">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5816">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5817">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5817">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5818">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5818">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5819">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5819">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5820">헝가리어 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5820">hungarian social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5821">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5821">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5822">socialsecuritynumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5822">socialsecuritynumber#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5837">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5837">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5838">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5838">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5839">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5839">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5840">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5840">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5841">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5841">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5842">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5842">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5843">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5844">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5845">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5845">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5847">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5847">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5848">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5848">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5849">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5849">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5850">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5850">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5851">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5852">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5852">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5854">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5855">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5855">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5856">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5857">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5858">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5858">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5884">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5884">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5885">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5885">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5886">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5886">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5887">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5887">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5888">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5888">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5889">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5889">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5890">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5890">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5891">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5892">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5892">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5893">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5894">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5894">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5895">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5895">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5896">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5896">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5897">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5897">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5898">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5899">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5900">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5901">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5902">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5902">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5903">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5903">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5904">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5905">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5905">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5907">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5907">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5917">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5917">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5919">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5919">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5920">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5921">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5921">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5922">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5923">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5923">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5924">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5924">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5925">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5925">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5926">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5926">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5927">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5927">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5928">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5928">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5929">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5929">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5930">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5930">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5931">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5931">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5932">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5932">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5933">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5933">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5934">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5934">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5935">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5935">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5936">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5936">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5938">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5938">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5939">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5939">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5941">인도 고유 식별(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5941">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5942">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5943">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5943">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5944">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5945">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5945">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5946">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5946">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5947">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5947">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5948">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5948">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5949">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5949">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5950">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5950">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5951">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5951">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5952">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5953">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5953">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5954">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5955">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5955">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5956">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5956">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5957">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5957">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5958">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5958">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5959">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5959">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5960">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5960">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5961">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5963">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5963">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5966">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5966">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5967">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5967">uid</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5970">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5970">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5971">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5972">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5972">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5974">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5974">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5975">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5975">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5976">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5976">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5977">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5977">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5978">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5978">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5979">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5979">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5980">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5980">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5981">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5981">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5982">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5982">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5983">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5986">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5986">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5987">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5987">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5988">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5988">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5989">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5989">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5990">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5990">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5991">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5991">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5992">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5992">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5993">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5993">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5994">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5994">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5995">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5996">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5996">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-5997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-5998">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5998">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-5999">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-5999">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6000">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6000">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6001">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6001">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6002">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6002">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6003">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6003">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6004">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6004">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6005">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6005">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6006">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6007">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6007">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6009">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6009">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6010">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6010">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6011">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6011">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6012">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6012">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6013">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6013">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6014">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6014">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6016">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6016">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6018">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6018">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6019">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6022">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6023">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6023">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6024">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6024">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6025">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6026">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6026">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6027">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6027">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6028">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6028">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6029">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6029">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6030">[ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6030">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6031">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6031">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6032">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6032">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6033">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6033">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6034">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6034">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6035">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6035">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6036">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6036">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6037">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6038">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6038">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6039">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6040">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6040">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6041">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6041">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6042">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6042">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6043">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6043">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6044">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6044">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6045">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6045">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6046">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6046">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6047">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6047">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6048">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6048">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6049">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6049">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6050">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6050">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6051">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6051">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6052">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6052">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6053">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는(기간 없음) 버전을 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6053">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6054">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6054">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6055">서식이 지정된 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6055">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6056">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6057">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6058">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6058">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6059">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6060">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 경우 높은 신뢰도로 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6060">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6061">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6061">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6062">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6062">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6063">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6063">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6064">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6064">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6065">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6065">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6066">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6066">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6067">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6067">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6068">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6068">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6069">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6069">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6070">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6070">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6071">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6071">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6072">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6072">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6073">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6073">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6074">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6074">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6075">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6075">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6076">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6076">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6077">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6078">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6078">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6080">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6080">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6081">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6081">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6082">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6082">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6083">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6084">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6084">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6086">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6086">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6087">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6088">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6212">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6212">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6213">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6214">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6214">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6215">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6215">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6216">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6216">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6217">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6217">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6218">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6218">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6219">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6220">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6222">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6223">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6223">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6224">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6225">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6225">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6226">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6227">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6227">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6228">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6229">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6229">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6252">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6252">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6253">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6254">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6254">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6255">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6255">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6256">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6256">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6257">7자리 숫자와 2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6257">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6259">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6259">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6260">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6260">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6261">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6261">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6262">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6262">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6263">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6263">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6264">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6264">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6265">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6265">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6266">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6267">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6267">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6268">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6269">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6269">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6270">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6270">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6271">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6271">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6272">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6272">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6274">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6274">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6275">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6275">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6320">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6320">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6321">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6322">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6322">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6323">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6324">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6324">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6325">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6325">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6326">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6326">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6327">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6327">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6328">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6328">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6329">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6329">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6330">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6330">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6331">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6331">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6332">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6333">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6333">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6335">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6335">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6336">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6336">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6337">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6337">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6338">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6338">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6339">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6339">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6340">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6340">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6341">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6341">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6342">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6342">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6343">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6343">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6344">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6344">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6345">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6346">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6346">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6348">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6348">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6349">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6350">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6352">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6352">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6353">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6353">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6354">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6354">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6355">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6355">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6374">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6374">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6375">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6375">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6376">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6377">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6377">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6379">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6379">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6380">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6380">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6381">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6381">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6382">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6383">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6383">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6384">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6385">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6385">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6387">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6388">`Regex_italy_drivers_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6388">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6389">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6389">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6516">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6516">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6517">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6517">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6518">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6518">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6519">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6519">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6520">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6520">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6521">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6521">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6522">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6522">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6523">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6524">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6524">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6526">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6526">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6527">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6527">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6528">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6528">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6529">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6529">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6530">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6530">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6531">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6531">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6532">사람이 태어나는 시외 지역에 해당하는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6532">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6533">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6533">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6534">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6535">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6535">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6536">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6537">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6538">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6538">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6539">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6539">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6540">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6541">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6541">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6576">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6576">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6577">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6578">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6578">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6580">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6580">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6581">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6581">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6582">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6582">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6583">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6584">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6584">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6585">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6586">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6586">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6587">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6587">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6588">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6588">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6589">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6589">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6590">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6591">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6591">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6592">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6592">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
