## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6616">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6616">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6617">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6617">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6618">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6618">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6619">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6619">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6620">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6620">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6621">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6621">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6622">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6622">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6623">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6624">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6624">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6625">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6626">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6626">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6627">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6627">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6628">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6628">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6629">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6629">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6630">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6630">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6631">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6632">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6632">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6634">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6634">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6635">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6635">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6636">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6636">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6637">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6637">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6638">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6638">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6646">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6646">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6647">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6648">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6648">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6649">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6650">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6650">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6651">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6651">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6652">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6652">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6653">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6653">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6654">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6654">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6655">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6655">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6656">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6659">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6659">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6660">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6660">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6661">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6661">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6662">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6662">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6663">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6663">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6664">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6665">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6665">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6666">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6666">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6667">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6667">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6714">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6714">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6715">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6716">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6716">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6717">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6718">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6718">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6719">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6720">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6721">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6722">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6723">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6723">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6724">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6724">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6762">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6762">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6763">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6763">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6764">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6764">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6765">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6765">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6766">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6766">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6767">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6767">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6768">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6768">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6769">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6770">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6770">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6771">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6772">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6772">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6773">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6773">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6774">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6774">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6775">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6776">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6778">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6779">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6779">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6780">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6780">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6781">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6782">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6782">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6797">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6797">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6798">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6798">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6799">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6799">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6800">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6800">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6801">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6801">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6802">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6803">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6803">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6805">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6805">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6806">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6806">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6807">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6807">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6808">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6808">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6809">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6809">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6810">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6810">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6811">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6811">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6812">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6812">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6813">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6813">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6814">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6814">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6815">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6815">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6816">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6816">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6817">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6817">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6818">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6818">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6819">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6819">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6820">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6820">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6821">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6821">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6822">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6822">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6823">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6823">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6824">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6824">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6825">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6825">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6826">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6826">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6827">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6827">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6828">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6828">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6829">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6829">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6830">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6830">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6831">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6831">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6832">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6833">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6833">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6834">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6834">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6835">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6835">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6836">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6837">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6837">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6839">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6840">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6840">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6841">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6841">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6843">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6843">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6844">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6844">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6845">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6845">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6846">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6846">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6847">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6847">Passport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6849">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6849">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6850">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6850">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6851">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6851">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6852">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6852">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6853">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6853">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6854">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6854">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6855">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6855">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6856">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6856">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6857">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6857">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6858">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6858">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6860">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6860">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6862">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6862">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6863">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6863">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6864">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6864">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6865">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6865">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6866">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6867">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6869">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6869">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6870">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6870">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6871">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6871">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6872">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6872">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6873">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6873">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6874">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6874">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6875">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6875">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6876">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6876">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6877">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6877">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6878">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6878">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6879">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6879">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6880">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6880">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6881">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6882">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6882">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6884">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6884">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6885">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6888">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6889">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6889">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6890">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6890">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6891">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6891">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6892">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6892">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6893">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6893">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6894">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6894">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6895">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6895">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6896">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6896">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6897">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6897">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6898">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6898">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6899">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6899">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6900">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6900">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6901">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6901">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6902">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6902">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6903">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6903">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6904">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6905">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6905">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6907">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6907">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6908">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6908">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6909">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6909">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6910">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6910">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6911">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6911">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6912">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6913">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6914">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6915">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6916">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6916">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6917">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6917">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6918">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6919">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6919">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6920">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6920">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6941">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6941">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6942">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6943">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6943">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6944">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6945">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6945">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6946">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6946">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6947">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6947">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6948">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6949">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6949">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-6950">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-6951">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6952">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6952">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-6953">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-6953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7078">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7078">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7079">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7080">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7080">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7081">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7081">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7082">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7082">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7083">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7083">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7084">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7084">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7085">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7085">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7086">생년월일 세기(19세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7086">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7087">임의로 생성된 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7087">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7088">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7088">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7089">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7089">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7090">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7090">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7091">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7091">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7092">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7093">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7094">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7095">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7096">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7096">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7097">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7097">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7098">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7099">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7099">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7162">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7162">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7163">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7164">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7164">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7166">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7166">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7167">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7167">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7168">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7168">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7169">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7172">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7173">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7173">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7174">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7175">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7176">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7177">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7177">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7178">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7201">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7201">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7202">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7203">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7203">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7204">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7205">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7205">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7206">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7207">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7207">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7208">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7209">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7210">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7210">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7211">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7211">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7336">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7336">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7337">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7338">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7339">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7340">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7341">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7342">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7343">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7344">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7344">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7346">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7346">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7347">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7347">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7348">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7348">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7349">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7349">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7350">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7350">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7351">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7352">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7352">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7354">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7354">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7355">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7355">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7356">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7356">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7357">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7357">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7358">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7358">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7393">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7393">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7394">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7395">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7395">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7396">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7397">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7397">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7398">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7399">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7399">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7401">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7401">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7402">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7402">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7403">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7403">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7404">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7404">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7405">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7405">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7406">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7406">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7407">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7407">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7427">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7427">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7428">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7428">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7429">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7429">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7430">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7430">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7431">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7431">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7432">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7433">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7433">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7435">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7435">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7436">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7436">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7437">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7561">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7561">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7562">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7562">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7563">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7563">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7564">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7564">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7565">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7565">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7566">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7566">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7567">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7567">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7568">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7568">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7569">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7569">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7570">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7570">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7571">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7571">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7572">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7572">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7573">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7573">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7574">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7575">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7575">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7576">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7577">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7577">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7578">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7578">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7579">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7579">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7580">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7580">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7581">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7581">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7604">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7604">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7605">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7605">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7606">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7606">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7607">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7607">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7608">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7608">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7609">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7610">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7610">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7612">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7612">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7613">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7613">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7614">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7614">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7615">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7615">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7616">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7617">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7617">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7618">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7650">룩부르크 국가 식별 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7650">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7651">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7652">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7652">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7654">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7654">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7655">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7655">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7656">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7656">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7657">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7657">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7658">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7658">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7659">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7659">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7660">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7660">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7661">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7661">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7662">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7662">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7663">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7663">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7664">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7664">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7665">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7665">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7666">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7666">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7667">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7667">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7668">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7668">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7669">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7669">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7670">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7670">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
