## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7710">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7710">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7711">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7712">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7712">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7713">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7714">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7714">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7715">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7715">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7716">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7716">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7717">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7717">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7718">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7718">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7719">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7719">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7720">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7720">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7721">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7722">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7722">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7723">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7724">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7725">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7725">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7726">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7726">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7753">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7753">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7754">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7755">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7755">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7757">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7757">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7758">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7758">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7759">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7759">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7760">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7760">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7761">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7761">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7762">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7762">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7763">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7764">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7764">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7766">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7767">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7767">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7768">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7768">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7892">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7892">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7893">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7893">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7894">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7894">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7895">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7895">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7896">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7896">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7897">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7897">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7898">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7898">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7899">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7900">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7900">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7901">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7902">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7902">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7903">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7903">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7904">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7904">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7905">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7906">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7906">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7907">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7908">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7909">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7909">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7910">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7910">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7911">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7911">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7912">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7912">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7921">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7921">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7922">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7922">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7926">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7926">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7929">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7929">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7930">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7931">공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7931">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7933">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7933">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7934">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7934">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7935">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7935">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7936">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7936">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7937">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7937">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7938">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7938">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7939">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7939">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7940">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7940">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7941">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7941">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7942">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7943">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7956">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7956">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7957">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7957">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7963">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7963">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7964">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7965">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7965">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7966">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7966">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7967">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7967">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7968">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7968">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7970">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7970">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7971">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7971">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7972">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7972">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7973">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7973">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7974">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7974">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7975">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7976">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7976">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-7977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7978">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7978">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7979">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7979">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7980">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7980">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-7981">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7981">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-7982">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-7982">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8015">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8015">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8016">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8017">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8017">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8018">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8019">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8019">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8020">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8020">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8021">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8021">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8022">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8022">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8023">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8023">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8024">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8024">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8025">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8026">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8026">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8028">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8028">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8029">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8029">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8030">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8030">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8031">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8032">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8032">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8033">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8033">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8034">bsn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8034">bsn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8038">person number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8038">person number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8041">사람 관련 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8041">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8042">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8042">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8043">persoonlijke 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8043">persoonlijke numerieke code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8044">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8044">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8045">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8045">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8046">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8046">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8047">social-fiscal number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8047">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8048">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8048">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8049">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8049">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8050">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8050">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8051">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8051">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8052">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8052">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8053">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8053">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8054">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8054">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8055">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8055">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8056">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8057">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8057">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8058">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8058">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8059">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8059">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8060">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8061">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8061">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8063">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8063">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8064">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8064">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8065">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8065">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8193">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8193">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8194">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8195">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8195">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8197">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8197">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8198">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8198">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8199">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8199">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8200">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8200">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8201">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8201">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8202">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8202">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8203">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8203">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8204">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8204">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8205">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8205">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8206">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8206">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8207">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8207">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8225">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8225">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8226">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8226">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8227">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8227">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8228">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8228">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8229">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8229">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8230">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8230">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8231">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8231">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8232">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8233">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8233">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8234">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8235">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8235">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8236">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8237">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8237">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8239">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8240">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8240">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8241">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8241">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8242">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8242">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8243">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8243">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8281">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8281">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8282">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8282">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8283">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8283">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8284">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8284">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8285">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8285">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8286">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8286">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8287">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8287">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8288">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8289">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8289">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8291">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8291">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8292">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8292">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8293">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8293">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8294">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8294">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8295">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8295">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8296">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8296">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8297">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8297">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8298">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8298">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8299">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8300">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8301">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8302">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8302">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8303">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8303">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8304">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8304">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8305">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8305">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8306">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8306">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8315">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8315">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8316">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8316">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8317">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8317">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8318">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8318">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8319">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8319">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8320">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8320">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8321">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8321">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8322">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8323">선택적 디지타이터를 통해 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8323">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8324">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8325">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8325">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8326">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8326">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8327">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8327">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8328">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8328">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8329">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8329">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8330">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8330">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8331">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8331">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8332">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8332">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8333">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8333">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8334">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8335">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8335">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8336">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8337">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8337">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8338">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8338">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8339">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8339">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8340">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8340">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8341">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8341">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8349">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8349">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8350">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8350">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8351">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8351">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8352">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8352">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8353">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8353">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8354">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8354">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8355">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8355">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8356">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8357">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8357">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8358">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8359">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8359">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8360">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8360">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8361">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8361">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8362">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8363">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8365">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8365">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8366">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8366">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8367">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8367">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8368">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8368">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8369">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8369">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8436">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8436">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8437">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8437">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8438">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8438">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8439">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8439">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8440">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8440">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8441">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8441">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8442">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8442">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8443">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8444">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8444">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8446">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8446">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8447">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8447">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8448">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8448">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8449">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8450">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8450">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8451">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8451">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8452">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8455">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8456">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8456">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8457">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8457">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8458">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8459">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8459">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8460">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8460">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8461">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8461">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8462">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8462">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8463">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8463">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8464">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8464">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8465">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8465">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8466">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8466">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8468">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8468">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8469">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8470">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8470">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8471">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8472">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8472">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8473">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8473">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8474">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8474">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8475">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8476">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8476">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8477">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8478">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8478">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8479">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8479">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8480">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8480">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8481">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8481">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8482">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8482">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8483">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8483">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8498">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8498">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8499">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8499">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8500">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8500">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8501">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8501">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8502">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8502">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8503">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8503">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8504">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8504">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8505">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8506">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8506">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8508">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8508">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8509">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8509">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8510">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8510">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8511">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8511">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8512">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8512">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8513">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8513">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8514">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8515">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8515">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8516">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8517">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8517">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8518">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8518">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8519">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8519">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8520">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8521">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8521">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8529">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8529">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8530">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8531">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8531">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8533">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8533">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8534">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8534">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8535">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8535">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8536">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8536">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8537">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8538">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8538">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8540">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8540">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8541">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8541">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8542">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8542">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8543">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8544">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8544">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8545">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8545">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8546">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8551">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8551">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8552">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8552">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8555">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8555">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8556">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8556">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8557">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8557">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8558">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8558">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8559">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8559">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8560">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8560">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8561">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8561">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8562">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8562">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8563">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8563">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8564">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8564">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8565">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8566">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8568">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8569">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8569">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8570">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8570">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8571">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8571">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8572">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8572">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8573">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8573">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8574">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8574">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8575">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8575">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8576">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8576">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8577">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8577">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8578">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8579">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8579">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8580">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8581">14자리 숫자와 두 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8581">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8582">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8582">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8583">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8583">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8584">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8584">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8585">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8585">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8586">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8586">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8587">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8588">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8588">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8589">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8590">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8591">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8591">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8592">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8592">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
