## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8716">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8716">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8717">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8717">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8718">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8718">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8719">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8719">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8720">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8720">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8721">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8722">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8723">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8724">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8724">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8725">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8725">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8726">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8726">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8727">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8728">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8729">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8729">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8730">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8730">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8731">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8731">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8732">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8732">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8733">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8733">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8734">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8734">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8735">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8735">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8736">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8736">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8737">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8737">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8738">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8738">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8739">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8740">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8740">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8741">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8741">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8742">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8742">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8743">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8743">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8744">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8744">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8745">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8746">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8748">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8749">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8749">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8750">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8750">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8751">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8751">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8752">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8752">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8753">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8753">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8754">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8754">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8755">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8755">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8756">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8756">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8757">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8757">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8759">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8759">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8760">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8760">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8761">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8761">nr.-pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8766">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8766">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8767">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8767">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8768">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8768">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8769">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8770">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8770">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8771">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8772">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8772">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8773">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8774">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8776">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8777">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8777">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8778">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8778">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8779">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8779">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8780">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8780">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8781">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8782">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8782">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8783">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8783">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8784">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8784">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8785">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8785">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8786">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8787">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8813">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8813">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8814">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8814">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8815">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8815">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8816">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8816">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8817">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8817">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8818">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8818">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8819">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8819">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8820">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8821">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8821">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8822">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8823">9자리 숫자 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8823">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8824">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8824">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8825">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8825">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8826">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8826">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8827">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8827">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8828">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8831">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8832">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8832">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8833">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8833">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8834">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8834">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8835">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8835">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8852">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8852">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8853">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8854">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8855">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8856">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8857">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8858">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8860">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8860">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8862">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8862">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8863">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8864">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8864">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8866">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8866">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8867">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8867">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8868">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8868">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8898">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8898">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8899">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8900">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8900">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8901">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8902">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8902">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8903">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8904">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8905">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8906">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8906">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8907">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8907">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8908">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8908">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8928">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8928">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8929">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8929">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8930">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8930">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8931">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8931">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8932">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8932">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8933">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8933">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8934">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8934">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8935">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8935">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8936">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8936">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8937">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8937">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8938">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8938">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8939">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8939">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8940">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8940">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8941">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8941">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8942">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8942">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8943">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8943">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8944">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-8946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-8947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8948">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8948">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8949">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-8964">driverslic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-8964">driverslic</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9081">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9081">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9082">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9082">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9083">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9083">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9084">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9084">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9085">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9085">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9086">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9086">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9087">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9087">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9088">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9089">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9089">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9090">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9091">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9091">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9092">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9092">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9093">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9093">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9094">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9094">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9095">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9096">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9096">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9097">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9124">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9124">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9125">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9126">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9126">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9127">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9128">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9128">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9129">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9129">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9130">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9130">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9131">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9131">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9132">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9132">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9133">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9134">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9134">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9137">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9137">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9138">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9138">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9139">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9139">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9140">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9140">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9165">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9165">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9166">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9167">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9167">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9169">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9169">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9170">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9170">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9171">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9171">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9175">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9176">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9176">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9177">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9305">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9305">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9306">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9306">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9307">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9307">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9308">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9308">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9309">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9309">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9310">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9310">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9311">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9311">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9312">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9313">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9313">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9314">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9314">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9315">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9315">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9316">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9316">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9317">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9317">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9318">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9318">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9319">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9319">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9320">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9320">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9321">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9321">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9322">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9322">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9323">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9323">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9324">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9324">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9325">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9326">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9326">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9377">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9377">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9378">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9379">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9379">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9381">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9381">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9382">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9383">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9384">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9385">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9385">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9386">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9386">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9387">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9388">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9388">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9390">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9390">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9391">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9391">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9409">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9409">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9410">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9410">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9411">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9411">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9412">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9412">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9413">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9413">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9414">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9414">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9415">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9415">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9416">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9417">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9417">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9418">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9419">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9419">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9420">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9420">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9421">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9421">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9422">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9422">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9423">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9423">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9424">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9424">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9425">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9426">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9426">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9427">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9428">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9428">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9429">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9429">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9430">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9430">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9447">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9447">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9448">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9448">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9449">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9449">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9450">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9450">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9451">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9451">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9452">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9452">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9453">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9453">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9454">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9455">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9455">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9457">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9457">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9458">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9458">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9459">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9460">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9460">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9461">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9462">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9464">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9464">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9465">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9465">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9466">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9466">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9483">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9483">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9484">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9485">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9485">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9487">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9487">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9488">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9489">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9491">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9492">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9492">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9493">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9493">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9494">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9494">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9495">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9495">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9496">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9496">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9498">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9498">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9499">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9499">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9500">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9500">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9501">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9502">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9502">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9503">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9503">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9504">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9504">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9505">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9505">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9506">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9506">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9507">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9507">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9508">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9509">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9509">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9510">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9511">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9511">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9512">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9512">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9513">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9513">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9514">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9514">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9515">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9515">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9516">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9516">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9517">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9517">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9518">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9518">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9528">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9528">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9529">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9530">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9530">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9532">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9532">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9533">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9533">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9534">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9534">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9535">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9536">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9536">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9537">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9538">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9538">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9539">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9539">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9540">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9540">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9541">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9541">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9666">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9666">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9667">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9668">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9669">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9670">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9671">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9672">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9673">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9674">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9674">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9675">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9675">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9676">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9676">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9677">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9677">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9678">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9678">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9679">선택 사항 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9679">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9680">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9681">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9681">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9683">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9684">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9684">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9685">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9685">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9686">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9686">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9687">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9687">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9734">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9734">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9735">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9736">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9736">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9738">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9738">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9739">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9740">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9740">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9742">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9742">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9743">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9743">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9744">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9744">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9745">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9745">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9746">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9746">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9747">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9747">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9748">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9748">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9770">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9770">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9771">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9772">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9772">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9774">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9774">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9775">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9776">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9776">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9778">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9778">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9779">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9779">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9780">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9780">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
