## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9907">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9907">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9908">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9908">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9909">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9909">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9910">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9910">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9911">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9911">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9912">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9912">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9913">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9913">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9914">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9915">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9915">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9917">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9917">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9918">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9918">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9919">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9919">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9920">같은 날에 태어나는 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9920">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9921">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9921">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9922">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9923">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9923">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9925">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9926">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9926">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9927">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9927">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9928">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9929">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9929">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9957">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9957">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9958">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9959">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9959">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9961">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9961">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9962">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9962">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9963">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9963">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9964">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9964">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9965">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9966">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9967">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9968">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9968">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9969">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9969">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9970">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9971">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9971">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9972">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9973">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9973">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9974">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9974">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9988">katevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9988">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-9997">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9997">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-9998">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9998">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-9999">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-9999">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10000">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10000">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10001">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10001">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10002">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10002">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10003">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10003">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10004">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10005">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10005">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10007">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10007">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10008">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10008">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10009">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10009">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10010">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10011">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10011">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10012">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10013">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10013">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10014">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10014">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10015">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10015">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10016">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10016">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10017">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10017">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10018">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10018">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10019">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10019">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10020">davkana katevilka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10020">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10021">identifikacijska aratevilka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10021">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10022">katevilka davkane datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10022">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10023">tax file no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10023">tax file no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10024">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10024">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10025">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10025">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10041">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10041">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10042">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10043">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10043">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10044">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10045">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10045">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10046">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10046">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10047">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10047">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10048">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10048">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10049">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10049">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10050">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10050">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10051">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10052">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10052">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10054">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10055">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10055">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10056">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10056">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10057">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10058">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10058">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10059">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10059">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10063">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10063">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10064">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10065">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10065">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10067">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10067">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10068">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10068">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10069">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10069">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10070">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10070">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10071">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10071">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10072">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10072">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10073">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10073">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10074">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10075">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10077">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10077">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10078">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10078">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10079">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10079">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10080">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10082">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10082">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10083">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10091">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10091">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10092">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10093">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10093">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10095">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10095">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10096">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10096">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10097">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10097">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10098">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10099">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10099">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10100">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10101">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10101">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10102">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10102">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10103">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10104">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10105">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10105">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10239">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10239">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10240">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10240">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10241">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10241">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10242">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10242">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10243">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10243">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10244">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10244">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10245">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10245">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10246">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10247">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10247">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10249">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10249">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10250">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10250">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10251">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10251">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10252">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10252">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10253">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10254">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10254">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10256">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10256">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10257">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10257">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10258">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10258">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10259">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10259">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10260">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10260">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10284">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10284">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10285">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10286">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10286">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10288">8-9자 또는 9자 조합 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10288">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10289">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10289">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10290">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10290">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10291">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10291">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10292">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10293">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10293">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10294">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10295">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10295">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10296">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10296">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10297">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10297">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10298">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10298">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10299">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10299">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10300">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10300">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10301">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10301">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10330">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10330">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10331">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10332">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10332">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10334">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10334">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10335">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10336">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10336">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10337">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10337">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10338">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10338">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10339">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10339">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10340">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10341">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10341">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10343">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10344">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10344">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10345">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10345">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10346">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10346">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10347">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10347">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10348">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10348">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10349">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10349">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10358">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10358">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10359">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10360">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10361">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10362">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10363">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10364">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10365">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10366">지정한 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10366">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10368">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10368">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10369">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10369">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10370">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10370">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10371">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10371">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10372">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10372">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10373">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10373">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10374">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10374">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10375">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10375">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10376">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10376">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10377">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10377">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10378">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10378">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10379">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10379">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10380">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10380">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10381">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10381">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10382">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10382">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10383">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10383">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10384">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10384">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10385">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10385">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10386">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10386">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10387">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10388">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10388">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10389">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10390">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10390">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10391">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10391">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10392">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10392">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10394">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10394">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10425">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10425">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10426">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10427">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10427">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10428">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10429">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10429">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10430">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10430">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10431">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10431">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10432">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10432">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10433">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10433">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10434">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10434">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10435">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10435">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10436">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10437">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10437">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10438">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10439">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10439">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10440">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10440">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10441">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10441">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10442">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10442">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10443">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10443">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10444">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10444">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10445">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10445">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10446">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10446">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10447">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10447">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10448">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10448">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10449">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10449">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10450">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10450">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10451">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10451">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10452">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10452">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10453">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10453">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10454">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10454">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10455">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10455">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10456">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10456">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10457">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10457">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10458">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10458">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10471">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10471">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10472">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10473">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10473">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10475">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10475">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10476">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10476">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10477">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10477">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10478">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10478">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10479">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10482">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10482">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10483">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10483">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10484">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10617">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10617">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10618">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10619">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10619">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10621">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10621">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10622">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10622">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10623">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10623">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10624">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10624">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10625">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10625">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10626">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10627">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10627">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10629">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10630">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10630">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10631">키워드가 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10631">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10632">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10632">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10633">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10633">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10634">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10634">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10635">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10635">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10654">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10654">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10655">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10656">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10656">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10657">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10658">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10658">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10659">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10662">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10663">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10663">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10664">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10664">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10665">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10665">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10666">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10666">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10667">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10667">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10668">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10668">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10702">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10702">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10703">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10703">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10704">스웨덴 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10704">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10705">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10705">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10706">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10706">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10707">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10707">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10708">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10708">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10709">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10709">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10710">생년월일에 해당하는 8자리 숫자(YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10710">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10711">일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자는 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10711">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10712">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성의 홀수 할당에 의해 성별을 나타내고 여성은 등수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10712">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10713">1990년 이전의 일련 번호 할당은 해당 번호의 원주민이 태어나는 시에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10713">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10714">또는 1947년 1월 1일 세금 기록에 따라 이민자에 대한 특수 코드(일반적으로 9번째 숫자)를 사용하여 생년월일인 경우(1947년 7월 1일 이전의 생년월일)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10714">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10715">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10715">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10716">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10717">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10717">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10718">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10719">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10720">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10720">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10721">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10721">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10722">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10722">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10723">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10723">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10739">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10739">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10740">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10740">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10741">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10741">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10742">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10742">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10743">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10743">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10744">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10744">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10745">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10745">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10746">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10747">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10747">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10749">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10749">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10750">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10750">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10751">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10751">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10752">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10752">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10753">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10753">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10754">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10754">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10755">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10755">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10756">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10757">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10759">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10759">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10760">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10760">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10761">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10761">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10762">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10763">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10763">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
