## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10789">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10789">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10790">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10791">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10791">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10793">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10793">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10794">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10794">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10795">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10795">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10796">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10796">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10797">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10797">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10798">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10798">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10799">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10799">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10800">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10800">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10801">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10801">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10802">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10803">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10803">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10804">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10804">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10841">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10841">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10842">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10842">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10843">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10843">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10844">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10844">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10845">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10845">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10846">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10846">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10847">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10847">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10848">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10848">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10849">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10849">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10850">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10850">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10851">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10851">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10852">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10852">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10853">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10853">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10854">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10854">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10855">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10855">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10856">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10856">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10857">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10857">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10858">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10858">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10859">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10860">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10860">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10861">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10862">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10862">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10863">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10863">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10864">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10864">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10865">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10865">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10866">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10866">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10887">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10887">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10888">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10889">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10889">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10890">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10891">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10891">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10892">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않는 영어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10892">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10893">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10893">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10894">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10894">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10895">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10896">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10896">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10897">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10898">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10898">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10899">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10899">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10900">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10900">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10901">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10901">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10902">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10902">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10903">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10903">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10904">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10904">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10906">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10906">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10907">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10907">身份證字號</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10921">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10921">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10922">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10922">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10923">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10923">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10924">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10924">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10925">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10925">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10926">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10926">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10927">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10927">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10928">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10928">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10929">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10929">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10930">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10930">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10931">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10932">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10932">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10934">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10934">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10935">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10935">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10936">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10936">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10938">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10938">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10939">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10939">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10940">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10940">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10941">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10941">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10942">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10942">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10943">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10943">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10944">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10944">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10945">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10945">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10946">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10946">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10947">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10947">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10948">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10949">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10949">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10950">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10951">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10951">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10952">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10952">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10953">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10953">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10954">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10955">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10957">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10957">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10958">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10958">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10959">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10959">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10960">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10960">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10961">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10961">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10962">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10962">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10963">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10963">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10964">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10964">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10965">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10965">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10966">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10966">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10967">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10967">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10968">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10968">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10969">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10969">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10970">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10970">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10971">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10971">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10972">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10972">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10973">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10973">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10974">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10975">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10975">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10977">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10977">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10978">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10978">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10979">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10979">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10980">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10981">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10981">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10983">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10984">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10984">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10985">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10985">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10986">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10987">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10987">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10988">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10989">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10989">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10990">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10990">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10991">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10991">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10992">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10992">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10993">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10993">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10994">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10994">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-10995">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10995">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10996">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10996">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10997">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-10998">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10998">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-10999">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-10999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11000">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11000">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11001">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11002">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11003">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11004">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11004">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11005">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11005">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11006">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11006">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11007">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11007">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11008">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11008">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11009">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11009">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11010">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11010">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11011">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11011">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11012">TC Kimlik numarasas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11012">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11014">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11014">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11015">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11015">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11016">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11016">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11017">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11018">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11018">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11019">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11020">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11020">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11021">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11021">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11022">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11022">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11023">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11023">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11024">드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 검사의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11024">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11025">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11025">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11026">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11026">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11027">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11028">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11029">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11030">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11030">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11031">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11031">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11032">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11032">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11033">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11033">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11034">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11034">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11035">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11035">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11036">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11036">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11157">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11157">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11158">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11158">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11159">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11160">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11160">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11161">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11162">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11162">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11163">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11166">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11166">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11167">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11167">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11168">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11169">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11169">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11170">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11170">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11171">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11171">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11172">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11172">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11173">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11173">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11174">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11174">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11175">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11175">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11176">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11176">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11177">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11178">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11178">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11180">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11180">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11181">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11181">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11182">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11182">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11183">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11183">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11184">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11184">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11185">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11185">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11186">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11187">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11187">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11188">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11189">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11189">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11190">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11190">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11191">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11191">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11192">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11192">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11193">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11193">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11194">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11194">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11195">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11213">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11213">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11214">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11214">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11215">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11215">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11216">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11216">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11217">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11218">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11218">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11220">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11220">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11221">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11221">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11222">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11222">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11223">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11223">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11224">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11224">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11225">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11225">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11226">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11226">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11227">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11228">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11228">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11229">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11229">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11230">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11230">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11231">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11231">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11232">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11232">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11233">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11233">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11235">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11235">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11238">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11238">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11239">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11240">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11241">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11241">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11242">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11242">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11243">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11243">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11244">national insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11244">national insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11245">national insurance contributions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11245">national insurance contributions</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11246">protection act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11246">protection act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11247">insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11247">insurance</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11263">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11263">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11264">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11264">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11265">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11265">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11266">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11266">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11267">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11267">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11268">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11268">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11269">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11269">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11270">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11270">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11271">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11272">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11272">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11274">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11274">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11275">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11276">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11278">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11278">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11279">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11279">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11280">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11280">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11300">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11300">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11301">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11302">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11302">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11303">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11304">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11304">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11305">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11306">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11307">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11308">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11309">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11309">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11310">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11310">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11340">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11340">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11341">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11341">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11342">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11342">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11343">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11343">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11344">종속됩니다. 예를 들어 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11344">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11345">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11345">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11346">ddddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11346">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11347">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11348">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11348">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11349">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11350">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11350">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11351">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11351">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11352">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11352">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11353">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11353">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11354">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11354">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11355">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11355">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11356">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11356">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11357">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11357">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11358">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11358">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11456">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11456">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11457">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11458">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11458">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11459">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11460">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11460">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11461">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11461">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11462">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11462">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11463">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11463">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11464">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11464">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11465">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11465">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11466">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11466">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11467">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11467">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11468">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11468">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11469">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11469">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11470">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11470">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11471">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11471">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11472">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11472">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11473">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11474">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11474">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11475">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11476">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11477">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11477">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11478">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11478">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11479">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11480">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11480">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11481">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11481">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11482">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11482">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11483">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11483">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11484">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11484">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11485">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11485">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11486">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11486">taxpayer</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11498">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11498">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11499">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11500">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11500">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11501">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11501">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11502">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11503">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11503">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11504">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11504">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11505">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddddddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11505">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11506">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11506">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11507">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11507">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11508">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11509">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11509">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11510">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11511">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11511">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11512">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11512">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11513">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11513">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11514">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11515">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11515">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11516">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11516">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11517">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11517">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11518">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11518">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11519">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11519">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11520">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11520">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11521">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11521">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11522">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11522">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11523">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11524">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11524">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11537">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11537">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11538">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11538">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11539">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11540">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11540">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11541">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11542">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11542">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11543">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11543">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11544">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11544">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11545">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11545">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11546">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11546">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11547">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11547">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11548">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11548">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11549">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11549">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11550">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11551">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11551">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11552">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11552">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11568">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11568">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11569">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11570">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11571">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11572">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11573">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11574">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11575">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11576">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11576">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11577">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11578">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11578">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11579">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11580">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11580">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11581">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11582">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11583">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11583">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11584">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11584">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11593">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11593">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11594">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11594">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11595">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11595">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11596">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11596">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11597">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11597">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11598">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11598">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11599">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11599">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11600">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11601">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11601">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11603">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11603">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11604">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11604">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11605">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11605">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11606">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11607">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1301d-11608">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1301d-11609">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11609">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11610">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11610">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1301d-11611">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1301d-11611">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
